name: Fallen Empires
description:
Command your forces and lead your kingdom to victory! Guide your troops through foreboding environments ranging from forests to desert villages to lava infernos. Complete all main story missions to unlock Moshpit mode - a free-for-all arcade with a twist.Gameplay Features:

  • Dynamic weather system
    • Weather conditions will alter the battlefield over time and impact the decisions you make as a commander
  • Command your forces
    • Direct your troops using our innovative navigation selection tool
  • Reactionary Enemy AI
    • The enemy will learn your strategy as the match progresses and will build its own strategy to counter your decisions
  • Upgrade your Army
    • Complete in-game challenges to earn upgrade points. Spend them to unlock new uniforms and upgrade your defenses
  • Build your Army
    • Unlock additional unit types as you progress through the campaign, including cavalry, mages, Giants, and more!
Game Modes:

  • Campaign
    • Battle your way through distant lands with the aide of your community council.
    • Track your in-game performance with Battle Stats to see how you stack up against other players

  • Mosphpit Mode
    • A fast-paced arcade style free-for-all with whacky weapons and troops
    • Battle legions of skeleton zombies with missile launchers, air strikes, landmines, and grizzly bears at your disposal
    • Unlocked after completion of campaign
